title: How can we bridge people with mental illness and tech careers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Offer more flexible jobs.More work-from-home opportunities.Offer online training and college class reimbursement.Temp agencies should offer more temp-to-hire or direct hire positions. Instead, they are notorious for amplifying insecurity by always being susceptible to sudden loss of position, lower pay, and a lesser-than quality as compared to full time company employees.Offer lower pay in exchange for flexibility, if needed.
